lyric:
[by:GeorgewithAnita]
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Toni Watson
[00:01.000] 作词 : Toni Watson
[00:08.37]They say "oh my god I see the way you shine"
[00:13.80]Take your hand my dear and place them both in mine
[00:18.08]You know you stopped me dead when I was passing by
[00:23.47]And now I beg to see you dance just one more time
[00:28.00]Ooh I see you see you see you every time
[00:33.42]And oh my I I I like your style
[00:38.04]You you make me make me make me wanna cry
[00:43.10]And now I beg to see you dance just one more time
[00:47.51]Sø I say
[00:49.02]Dance for me dance for me dance for me oh oh oh
[00:53.00]I've never seen anybody do the things you do before
[00:57.02]They say move for me move for me move for me ay ay ay
[01:02.66]And when you're done I'll make you do it all again
[01:07.77]I said oh my god I see you walking by
[01:12.60]Take my hands my dear and look me in my eyes
[01:17.21]Just like a monkey I've been dancing my whole life
[01:22.18]But you just beg to see me dance just one more time
[01:26.40]Ooh I see you see you see you every time
[01:32.00]And oh my I I I like your style
[01:36.29]You you make me make me make me wanna cry
[01:41.63]And now I beg to see you dance just one more time
[01:46.01]Sø I say
[01:47.49]Dance for me dance for me dance for me oh oh
[01:51.75]I've never seen anybody do the things you do before
[01:56.13]They say move for me move for me move for me ay ay
[02:01.34]And when you're done I'll make you do it all again
[02:05.96]They say
[02:07.01]Dance for me dance for me dance for me oh oh oh oh oh oh
[02:11.30]I've never seen anybody do the things you do before
[02:16.00]They say move for me move for me move for me ay ay
[02:20.58]And when you're done I'll make you do it all again
[02:26.72]Ooh (All again all again)
[02:32.96]Woah-oh woah-oh oh
[02:36.32]Ooh (All again all again)
[02:44.06]Ah ah ah ah ay
[02:45.45]They say
[02:46.64]Dance for me dance for me dance for me oh oh
[02:50.36]I've never seen anybody do the things you do before
[02:55.06]They say move for me move for me move for me ay ay
[02:59.56]And when you're done I'll make you do it all again
[03:04.49]They say
[03:05.75]Dance for me dance for me dance for me oh oh oh oh oh oh
[03:10.07]I've never seen anybody do the things you do before
[03:14.39]They say move for me move for me move for me ay ay
[03:19.40]And when you're done I'll make you do it all again
[03:24.23]All again
tlyric:
[by:唐琛琛琛琛]
[00:08.37]人们说你如此耀眼迷人
[00:13.80]亲爱的，牵起你的手时我拥有了我的世界
[00:18.08]与你擦肩而过时，所有的阴暗都散尽
[00:23.47]现在我只想看你翩翩起舞
[00:28.00]无论何时我的眼中都尽是你的光彩
[00:33.42]你就是我喜欢的模样，无可替代
[00:38.04]你让我兴奋得想哭
[00:43.10]现在我只想看你翩翩起舞
[00:47.51]我只想说
[00:49.02]为我跳支舞吧，就现在
[00:53.00]没有人比你做得更好，过去将来
[00:57.02]为了我而躁动吧
[01:02.66]等这支舞结束，让我邀你再跳一曲吧
[01:07.77]亲爱的，我看见你从我身边走过
[01:12.60]亲爱的，牵起我的手，看看我眼中的你吧
[01:17.21]像只猴子一样一起跳一生的舞吧？
[01:22.18]现在你也只想看我翩翩起舞
[01:26.40]无论何时我的眼中都尽是你的光彩
[01:32.00]你就是我喜欢的模样，无可替代
[01:36.29]你让我兴奋得想哭
[01:41.63]现在我只想看你翩翩起舞
[01:46.01]我只想说
[01:47.49]为我跳支舞吧，就现在
[01:51.75]没有人比你做得更好，过去将来
[01:56.13]为了我而躁动吧
[02:01.34]等这支舞结束，让我邀你再跳一曲吧
[02:05.96]他们也在说着
[02:07.01]为了我起舞吧，让我感受到你的爱意
[02:11.30]没有人比你做得更好，过去将来
[02:16.00]为了我而躁动吧
[02:20.58]等这支舞结束，让我邀你再跳一曲吧
[02:26.72]哼唱（一次次不断重复）
[02:32.96]哼唱
[02:36.32]哼唱（一次次不断重复）
[02:44.06]哼唱
[02:45.45]他们也在说着
[02:46.64]为了我跳支舞吧，就现在
[02:50.36]没有人比你做得更好，过去将来
[02:55.06]为了我而躁动吧
[02:59.56]等这支舞结束，让我邀你再跳一曲吧
[03:04.49]他们也在说着
[03:05.75]为了我起舞吧，让我感受你的爱意
[03:10.07]没有人会比你更让我深爱
[03:14.39]为了我而躁动
[03:19.40]等这支舞结束，我们共舞一曲吧
[03:24.23]再一次吧
